Package org.jugsaxony.treed.root

Class Simulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • org.jugsaxony.treed.root.Simulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Constants
    public class Simulator
extends javafx.application.Application
implements Constants
    Main class of JavaFX simulator (call -h for help). The positions of all Bulbs and the name of the animation can be passed in as parameter.
